13799.en:
The copy of 'Choten Yugi: Book Three' in your
possession began to glow!
13799.ja:
<pc>の　持っている
『超天遊戯－参の書－』が　光り始めた！
13799.zh-Hans:
<pc>持有的
《超天游戏－叁之书－》开始发光了！
13799.zh-Hant:
<pc>持有的
《超天遊戲－參之書－》開始發光了！

13800.en:
The blank pages are now filled with words.
<pc> began reading them.
13800.ja:
白紙だったページに　文字が浮かびあがってくる。
<pc>は　その文字を読んだ。
13800.ko:
백지였던 페이지에 글자가 나타났다.
{pc}|hpp(은,는) 그 글자를 읽었다.
13800.zh-Hans:
本是白纸的页面出现了文字。
<pc>阅读了这些文字。
13800.zh-Hant:
原本空白的頁面出現了文字。
<pc>閱讀了頁面上的文字。

13801.en:
So you found this place, too? ...Oh well. Let us continue your training. Let's give a shock to the martial artist who relies on weapons
too much!
13801.ja:
なんじゃ　ここも見つかってしまったか。
……まあよいわ。修行の続きといくぞ。
武器に頼りすぎの武闘家に　カツを入れてやろう。
13801.ko:
이런, 여기도 들키고 말았군.
……뭐, 그건 됐고. 수련을 계속하지.
무기에 의존하는 무투가를 위한 자극제를 주마.
13801.zh-Hans:
什么，这里也被你找到了啊。
……也罢，继续进行修行吧。
来给过度依赖武器的武术家一点刺激。
13801.zh-Hant:
什麼，這裡也被你找到了啊。
……也罷，繼續進行修行吧。
來給過度依賴武器的武術家一點刺激。

13802.en:
You must defeat a Trickstar, a monster
that roams this area, with your bare hands. No
weapons or shields are allowed!
13802.ja:
この辺りをうろつく魔物　<%sEV_QUE_NAME0>を
素手で　倒してくるんじゃ。
武器はもちろん　盾も装備しては　ならんぞ！
13802.ko:
이 부근을 돌아다니는 마물 {%sEV_QUE_NAME0}|hpp(을,를)
맨손으로 쓰러뜨리고 오거라.
무기는 물론, 방패도 장비해서는 안 돼!
13802.zh-Hans:
空手打倒在这附近游荡的怪物
<%sEV_QUE_NAME0>吧。
不光是武器，盾也不许装备哦！
13802.zh-Hant:
空手打倒在這附近遊蕩的怪物
<%sEV_QUE_NAME0>吧。
不光是武器，連盾也不許裝備喔！

13803.en:
And in case you're not tired of hearing this, once you pummel them to death with your bare hands, you have to win the fight for it to
count. So get out there and defeat <%nEV_QUE_T_NUM0> of them!
13803.ja:
それと　聞きあきたかもしれんが　素手で倒したら
その戦いを勝って終わらせなければ　ならんでな。
では　５匹ほど　やっつけてくるんじゃ！
13803.ko:
그리고 지겹도록 들었겠지만 맨손으로 쓰러뜨리고
그 싸움을 이겨서 끝내야 하지.
그럼 5마리 정도 해치우고 오거라!
13803.zh-Hans:
另外，估计你也听腻了，在空手打倒它后，
还必须赢得战斗的胜利才行。
好了，去收拾掉５只吧！
13803.zh-Hant:
另外，我想你應該也聽膩了，在空手打倒牠後，
還必須贏得戰鬥的勝利才行。
好了，去收拾掉５隻吧！

13804.en:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>As I suspected... it was you, not Master Yarn,
who was completing the training.<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13804.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>「やはり……。修行を進めていたのは
　ヤーン様ではなく　あなたでしたか。<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13804.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>: 역시……. 수련을 하고 있는 건
　얀 님이 아니라 당신이었군요.<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13804.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>果然……进行修行的
不是杨大人而是你啊。<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13804.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>果然……進行修行的
不是楊大人而是你啊。<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13805.en:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>I apologize for not greeting you properly the
other day. I am Gaurad, a follower of Master
Yarn. A pleasure to make your acquaintance.<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13805.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>「先日は　ごあいさつできず　失礼しました。
　私はヤーン様の従者　ガウラドと申します。
　以後　お見知りおきを。<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13805.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>: 일전에는 인사도 없이 실례가 많았습니다.
　전 얀 님을 모시는 가우라드라고 합니다.
　잘 부탁드립니다.<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13805.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>上次没有好好打招呼，真是失礼了。
我叫高拉德，是杨大人的随从。
今后请多关照。<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13805.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>上次沒有好好打招呼，真是失禮了。
我叫高拉德，是楊大人的隨從。
今後請多關照。<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13806.en:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>I am sure you are doing this training without
any idea of what it is you are actually doing.<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13806.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>「きっと　あなたは　何も知らされずに
　その修行を　やっているのでしょうね。<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13806.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>: 아마도 당신은 아무것도 모른 채
　이 수련을 하고 있는 거겠죠.<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13806.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>你一定是在什么都不知道的情况下
进行着那个修行吧。<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13806.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>你一定是在什麼都不知道的情況下
進行著那個修行吧。<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13807.en:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>I can't believe he would allow someone else to
do the training to inherit the title of Chosen
One... what is Master Yarn thinking?<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13807.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>「超天道士の名を継ぐための修行を
　他人にやらせるとは……。
　まったく　ヤーン様は　何をお考えか。<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13807.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>: 초천도사의 이름을 계승하기 위한 수련을
　남에게 떠넘기다니…….
　대체 얀 님은 무슨 생각을 하시는 건지.<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13807.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>竟然让别人去做
继承超天道士的名号的修行……
杨大人究竟在想些什么。<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13807.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>竟然讓別人去做
繼承超天道士的名號的修行……
楊大人究竟在想些什麼。<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13808.en:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>I, too, became an apprentice in the hopes of
becoming the next Chosen One. I would take
your place, if I could...<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13808.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>「私も超天道士にあこがれ　弟子入りを望んだ者。
　代われるものなら　代わりたいというのに……。<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13808.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>: 저 역시 초천도사를 동경해
　제자가 되길 희망했던 터라
　대신할 수만 있다면 제가 하고 싶군요…….<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13808.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>我也仰慕着超天道士，希望成为他的弟子。
如果可以的话，真想取代你啊……<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13808.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>我也仰慕著超天道士，希望成為他的弟子。
如果可以的話，真想取代你啊……<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13809.en: <start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>No, excuse me... we will see each other again.<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13809.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>「いや　失礼しました……。
　それでは　また　お会いしましょう。<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13809.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>: 이런, 실례했습니다…….
　그럼 다음에 또 뵙죠.<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13809.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>我失态了……
我们下次再见。<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13809.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>抱歉，是我失態了……
我們下次再見。<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13854.en:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>It is my fault that <pc> makes such a
face, Master Yarn.<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13854.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>「<pc>殿が　そのような顔をなさるのは
　私のせいです　ヤーン様。<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13854.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>: <pc> 님이 그런 얼굴을 하신 건
　저 때문입니다, 얀 님.<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13854.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001><pc>大人之所以露出这样的表情
都是因为我，杨大人。<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13854.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001><pc>閣下之所以露出這樣的表情，
都是因為我，楊大人。<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13855.en:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>Gaurad? What are you talking about?
Did you bring me the next book?<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13855.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>「ガウラド？　なんだ～　どういうことだ。
　次の本を　持ってきてくれたんじゃないのか～？<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13855.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>: 가우라드? 뭐야~ 어떻게 된 거야?
　다음 책을 가지러 간 거 아니었어~?<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13855.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>是高拉德啊？怎么回事，
你没有把下一本书带来吗？<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13855.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>是高拉德啊？怎麼回事，
你沒有把下一本書帶來嗎～？<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13856.en:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>If I brought you the next book, it would be
<pc>, not you, who would complete
the training within, wouldn't it?<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13856.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>「私が　次の書を持ってきたとして
　その書の修行を果たすのは　あなたではなく
　<pc>殿というわけですか。<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13856.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>: 제가 다음 책을 가져왔다 해도
　그 책으로 수련하는 건 당신이 아니라
　<pc> 님 아닙니까?<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13856.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>就算我将下一本书带来，
进行修行的也不是你，
而是<pc>大人吧。<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13856.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>就算我將下一本書帶來，
進行修行的也不是你，
而是<pc>閣下吧。<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13857.en: <start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>Ahh～, looks like I've been found out.<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13857.ja: <start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>「あちゃ～。バレちまったのか～。<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13857.ko: <start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>: 이런~ 들켰군~<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13857.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>哎呀～露馅了啊～<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13857.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>哎呀～露餡了啊～<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13858.en:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>You are a legendary martial artist, the only
one whom the old Chosen One ever acknowledged
as a disciple in his entire life.<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13858.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>「あなたは　伝説の武闘家である　超天道士様が
　その生涯で　唯一の弟子と認めた　お方。<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13858.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>: 당신은 전설의 무투가인 초천도사님이
　생전에 유일하게 제자로 인정하신 분입니다.<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13858.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>你是传说中的武术家超天道士大人
一生中唯一认可的弟子。<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13858.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>你是傳說中的武術家──超天道士大人
一生中唯一認可的弟子。<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13859.en:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>And yet, ever since the death of the master,
all you ever do is play around...<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13859.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>「だというのに　超天道士様の死後
　あなたは　遊んでばかり……。<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13859.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>: 그런데 초천도사님이 돌아가신 뒤로는
　매일 놀기만 하시고…….<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13859.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>但是，在超天道士大人死后，
你却只知道玩乐……<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13859.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>但是，在超天道士大人死後，
你卻只知道玩樂……<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13860.en:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>I was overjoyed when I thought you had made up
your mind and decided to inherit the title of
Chosen One...<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13860.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>「そのあなたが　ようやく
　超天道士様の名を継ぐ覚悟を決めたのかと
　私は　よろこんでおりましたのに……。<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13860.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>: 그랬던 당신이 드디어
　초천도사님의 이름을 이을 각오가 된 줄 알고
　진심으로 기뻐했는데…….<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13860.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>本以为你总算做好了继承
超天道士大人之名的心理准备，
我还感到很高兴呢……<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13860.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>本以為你總算做好了繼承
超天道士大人之名的心理準備，
我還感到很高興呢……<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13861.en:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>I told you plenty of times before, I'm not
interested in the Chosen One's title. That's
why I was having them do it instead.<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13861.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>「何度も　言ってきたはずだ。
　オレは超天道士の名になんか　興味ない。
　だから　コイツに継いでもらおうと思ってな～。<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13861.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>: 여러 번 말했잖아.
　난 초천도사란 이름에 관심 없어.
　그러니 이 녀석한테 잇게 할 거야~<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13861.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>我已经说过很多次了。
我对超天道士的名号不感兴趣。
所以想让这家伙继承呢～<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13861.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>我已經說過很多次了。
我對超天道士的名號不感興趣。
所以才想讓這傢伙繼承～<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13862.en:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>Sorry, <pc>. I didn't mean to
deceive you.<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13862.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>「悪いな～　<pc>。
　だますつもりじゃ　なかったんだ。<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13862.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>: 미안해, <pc>.
　속이려던 건 아니었어.<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13862.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>不好意思啊～<pc>。
我并没打算骗你。<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13862.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>不好意思啊～<pc>。
我並沒打算騙你。<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13863.en:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>I thought you were more worthy than me to
inherit the title of Chosen One.<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13863.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>「アンタは　オレよりも　超天道士の名を継ぐのに
　ふさわしいヤツだと　思ったんだよ。<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13863.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>: 네가 나보다 초천도사의 이름을 잇기에
　더 적합한 사람이라고 생각했거든.<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13863.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>我觉得你比我更适合
继承超天道士的名号啊。<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13863.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>我覺得你比我更適合
繼承超天道士的名號。<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13864.en:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>You are mistaken. You have gotten
<pc> into a lot of trouble.<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13864.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>「それは　まちがいです。
　あなたは　<pc>殿を　大変なことに
　巻き込んでしまわれたのですよ。<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13864.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>: 그건 착각입니다.
　당신은 <pc> 님을 위험한 일에
　끌어들이고 말았어요.<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13864.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>你错了。
你将<pc>大人卷进了
天大的麻烦中。<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13864.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>你錯了。
你將<pc>大人捲進了
天大的麻煩中。<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13865.en: <start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>Mistaken? What do you mean, involved?<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13865.ja: <start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>「まちがい～？　巻き込んだって　何にだよ？<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13865.ko: <start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>: 착각~? 끌어들이다니 뭘?<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13865.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>我错了？卷进什么麻烦事情里了？<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13865.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>我錯了～？捲進什麼麻煩事裡了？<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13866.en: <start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>If this continues, they will die.<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13866.ja: <start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>「このままでは　死にます。<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13866.ko: <start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>: 이대로 가다간 죽을 겁니다.<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13866.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>这样下去会死的。<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13866.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>這樣下去會死的。<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13867.en: <start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>Huh? Why do you say that?<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13867.ja: <start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>「はあ～？　なんで死ぬんだよ。<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13867.ko: <start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>: 뭐~? 왜 죽는단 거야?<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13867.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>啊？为什么会死啊。<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13867.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>啊～？為什麼會死啊。<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13868.en:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>The next and final book... is also known as
the Book of Death. It bears the ancient symbol
representing death.<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13868.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>「次の書……最後の書の名は　死の書。
　生きるか死ぬかの　死の文字を冠する書です。<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13868.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>: 다음 권인 마지막 책의 이름은 죽음의 권.
　이름 그대로 수련자의 생사를 가르는 책입니다.<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13868.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>下一本书……最后的书名为死之书。
死之书的死，就是生死的死。<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13868.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>下一本書……最後的書名為死之書。
死之書的死，就是生死的死。<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13869.en:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>But they're the one who's been doing the
training. Are you saying that they're going to
die?<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13869.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>「だが　修行を進めているのは　コイツだぜ～。
　ということは　死ぬのは　コイツだろ？<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13869.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>: 하지만 수련을 한 건 이 녀석이잖아~?
　그럼 이 녀석이 죽는 거 아냐?<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13869.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>但是，修行的不是这家伙吗～
也就是说，会死的是这家伙吧？<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13869.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>但是，修行的不是這傢伙嗎～
也就是說，會死的是這傢伙吧？<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13870.en:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>Yes. <pc> has advanced their
training from the Choten Yugi books to the
point of no return...<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13870.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>「そうです。<pc>殿は
　超天遊戯の書の修行を　後戻りの
　できないところまで　進めてしまわれた……。<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13870.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>: 그렇습니다. <pc> 님은
　돌이킬 수 없는 단계까지
　초천유희의 서를 수련하셨죠…….<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13870.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>没错。<pc>大人
已经将超天游戏之书的修行
进行到不可挽回的地步了……<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13870.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>沒錯。<pc>閣下
已經將超天遊戲之書的修行
進行到無可挽回的地步了……<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13871.en:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>After completing the training in Book Three,
<pc> has attained a state where they
have acquired much of the Chosen One's power.<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13871.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>「参の書までの修行を終えた　<pc>殿は 
　すでに　超天道士様のチカラの多くが
　身に備わった状態にあります。<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13871.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>: 3권까지 수련을 마친 <pc> 님의 몸에는
　이미 초천도사님의 힘이
　상당히 충만해진 상태입니다.<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13871.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001><pc>大人结束了叁之书的修行，
体内已经拥有太多
超天道士大人的力量了。<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13871.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001><pc>閣下結束了參之書的修行，
體內已經擁有太多
超天道士大人的力量了。<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13872.en:
If such a person in that state fails to complete the final training and inherit the title of Chosen One, their body will not be
able to withstand that power...
13872.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>「その状態の者が　最後の修行を果たせず
　超天道士の名を継げなかった場合
　内なるチカラの暴走に　肉体が耐えきれず……<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13872.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>: 그 상태에서 마지막 수련을 마쳐
　초천도사의 이름을 잇지 않으면
　힘이 폭주해 육체가 견디지 못하고……<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13872.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>在这种状态下，如果此人没有完成
最后的修行，没能继承超天道士的名号，
肉体会无法承受体内力量的肆虐……<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13872.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>在這種狀態下，如果此人沒有完成
最後的修行，沒能繼承超天道士的名號，
肉體會無法承受體內力量的肆虐……<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13873.en:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>The only conclusion... will be death. There is
no way for <pc> to escape that fate.<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13873.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>「行きつく先は……死あるのみ。
　<pc>殿が　その運命から
　逃れることは　できないのです。<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13873.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>: 결국…… 죽음에 이르게 됩니다.
　<pc> 님은 그 운명에서
　벗어나실 수 없습니다.<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13873.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>之后就是……死路一条。
<pc>大人是不可能
逃脱这个命运的。<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13873.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>之後就是……死路一條。
<pc>閣下是不可能
逃脫這個命運的。<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>

24450.ja: <start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>「マジかよ…………。<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
24450.ko: <start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>: 그게 사실이야…………?<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
24450.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>真的假的…………<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
24450.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>真的假的…………<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>

24451.en:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>The responsibility for this lies with you,
Master Yarn. The title of Chosen One is one
that carries great weight.<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
24451.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>「責任は　ヤーン様にあるのですよ。
　超天道士の名とは　それほどに
　重たいものなのです。<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
24451.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>: 전부 얀 님 때문입니다.
　초천도사의 이름은
　그만큼 무거운 겁니다.<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
24451.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>这是杨大人该负责的，
超天道士的名号
就是如此沉重。<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
24451.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>這是楊大人該負責的，
超天道士的名號
就是如此沉重。<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13875.en:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>...Got it. I'll do something about it.
Give me the Book of Death, Gaurad.<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13875.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>「……わかった。オレが　なんとかする。
　死の書をよこせ　ガウラド。<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13875.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>: ……알았어, 내가 해결할게.
　죽음의 권을 줘, 가우라드.<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13875.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>……我知道了。我会想办法的。
把死之书拿来吧，高拉德。<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13875.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>……好吧，我會想辦法的。
把死之書拿來吧，高拉德。<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13876.en:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>I do not have it. You will have to find the
Book of Death yourself.<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13876.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>「私は持っていません。死の書が　どこにあるかは
　ご自身で探されると　よいでしょう。<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13876.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>: 제게는 없습니다.
　죽음의 권이 어디 있는지는 직접 찾아보시죠.<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13876.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>死之书没在我手上。
想要知道死之书在哪里，就自己去找吧。<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13876.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>死之書不在我手上。
想知道死之書在哪裡，就自己去找吧。<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13877.en:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>As the disciple of the former master, you
should have no trouble finding it, Master Yarn.<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13877.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>「超天道士様の弟子である　ヤーン様ならば
　見つけるのは　たやすいことかと。<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13877.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>: 초천도사님의 제자인 얀 님이라면
　금방 찾으실 수 있을 겁니다.<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13877.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>如果是超天道士大人的弟子杨大人的话
应该很容易就能找到了。<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13877.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>如果是超天道士大人的弟子楊大人，
應該很容易就能找到了。<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13878.en: <start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>Well then, I'll take my leave.<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13878.ja: <start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>「では　私は　これで。<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13878.ko: <start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>: 그럼 전 이만.<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13878.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>那么，我就告辞了。<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13878.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>那麼，我就告辭了。<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13879.en:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>You look like you can't believe what
you just heard.<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13879.ja: <start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>「今の話を　信じられないって顔してるな～。<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13879.ko: <start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>: 방금 한 얘기가 안 믿긴다는 표정이네~<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13879.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>你好像不相信刚才的话呢～<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13879.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>你好像不相信剛才的話呢～<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13880.en:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>Gaurad isn't the type of person to lie. More
than that, he's the kind of guy that would
have done anything for the old man.<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13880.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>「ガウラドは　ウソをつかない男だ。
　なによりも　あの超天道士の　じ～さんなら
　やりかねないぜ～。<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13880.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>: 가우라드는 거짓말은 하지 않아.
　무엇보다도 초천도사 영감님은
　이런 짓을 벌이고도 남을 사람이야~<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13880.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>高拉德是不会说谎的男人。
而且那个超天道士老爷子
确实干得出来这种事～<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13880.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>高拉德是不會說謊的男人。
而且那個超天道士老爺子
確實幹得出這種事～<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13881.en:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>Oh man, this is bringing back old memories.
I've been through a ton of horrible things
myself.<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13881.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>「ヤベ～。昔の記憶が　よみがえってきやがる。
　オレも　いろいろ　ひで～目にあったもんさ。<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13881.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>: 젠장~ 옛날 기억이 떠오르는군.
　나도 이래저래 많이 시달렸거든.<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13881.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>糟了～又想起过去的事情了。
我也受到了各种摧残啊。<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13881.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>糟了～又想起過去的事了。
我也受到了各種摧殘啊。<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13882.en:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>...Well, that's for another time. Looks like
you've got no choice but to continue your
training.<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13882.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>「……まあ～　それは　置いといてだ。
　とにかく　アンタには　修行を
　続けてもらわなきゃ　ならないみたいだ。<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13882.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>: ……뭐, 그 얘기는 차치하고.
　일단 넌 수련을 계속해야 할 것 같네.<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13882.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>……算啦～这个先不管。
看来你必须要
继续修行才行呢。<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13882.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>……算啦～這個先不管。
看來得請你
繼續修行才行。<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13883.en:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>It might be tough without good equipment.
Here, take this.<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13883.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>「いい装備がなきゃ　きついかもしれね～。
　コレを　受け取っておいてくれ。<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13883.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>: 아마 좋은 장비가 없으면 힘들 거야~
　이걸 받아.<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13883.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>没有好的装备，事情就难办了～
你收下这个吧。<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13883.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>沒有好的裝備，事情就難辦了～
收下這個吧。<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13884.en:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>I don't know if this will help you,
but here, take it.<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13884.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>「役に立つかは　わからね～が
　コレを　受け取っておいてくれ。<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13884.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>: 도움이 될진 모르겠지만
　이걸 받아.<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13884.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>虽然不知道能不能派上用场，
但你收下这个吧。<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13884.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>雖然不知道能不能派上用場，
但你收下這個吧。<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>

42173.en:
The quest ''<%sev_quest_name>''
has transgressed with finesse!<update_quedate><open_irai>
42173.ja:
クエスト『<%sEV_QUEST_NAME>』を
クリアしました！
　<update_quedate><open_irai>
